The PGC Olympathon 2014

Saturday, June 21st, 2014

Made possible by:

        

The Geek Olympathon is returns! Assemble your own SuperTeam of
geek knowledge and skill, and engage in a day-long contest of epic proportions,
culminating in a fantastic geek party and Award-a-Thon! 

PRIZES!

Here’s the full list of what the top three scoring teams may be able to walk away with!

  • Penny Arcade Expo – 5x 4-day passes to PAX Prime
    More prize details to come!

Plus, cash prizes courtesy of Guardian Games, Rose City Comic Con & iDope!

 

 

REGISTER ONLINE NOW:

$20 for teams of up to 5; $5 for individuals


Select registration type]:




Looking for a team? Want the latest info? Like us on Facebook and look for the perfect crew!

FULL EVENT LIST

Contest details to come as they develop!
